chaining module¶

Outputs LaTeX/TikZ chaining diagrams to Manager.stream.

  • q (int) –

chaining.chaining_diagram(nnodes)¶

Creates a TikZ-CD diagram showing node chains with connecting arrows and dotted lines between related nodes.

Parameters

nnodes (list[Node]) – List of nodes to visualize in the diagram

Return type

None
